text: h̄āk k̄heā h̄ỳā phwk nāng bāngthī phracêā k̄hxng k̄heā ca thrng pelī̀ynpælng h̄ı̂ kæ̀ k̄heā mī p̣hriyā thī̀ dī kẁā phwk nāng pĕn h̄ỵing thī̀ nxbn̂xm t̄h̀xm tn pĕn h̄ỵing p̄hū̂ ṣ̄rạthṭhā pĕn h̄ỵing p̄hū̂ p̣hạkdī pĕn h̄ỵing p̄hū̂ k̄hx lukæ̀thos̄ʹ pĕn h̄ỵing p̄hū̂ mạ̀n t̀x kā rxi bā daḥˌ pĕn h̄ỵing p̄hū̂ mạ̀n t̀x kār t̄hụ̄xṣ̄īl xd pĕn h̄ỵing thī̀ pĕn h̄m̂āy læa thī̀ pĕn h̄ỵing s̄āw
